title: kept "attempting to reconnect"
body: I was playing urf, and all the sudden i got "attempting to reconnect". I shut the game and log in again, I couldn't reconnect to the game. and all my rerolls were gone. and my internet was fine the whole time!

replies.body: It's possible that your connection might have been getting routed in a weird way when it was trying to reach our servers, which could explain why your internet was working fine for everything but League. Do me a favor and grab the network logs from that game if you can, and let our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) scan it. Take a screenshot and post it here so I can go over it with you.
